None.Name: Blessed Sigil
None.Description: Activate to bind a Wardençª¶å†± Sigil to a friendly structure in a 40m range. The affected structure gains and Ice Shield that absorbs up to 1000 damage and may restore its absorption capacity by 5 seconds as long as Wardençª¶å†± Sigil is attached. May also be attached to buildings that are still under construction. Reusable every 25 seconds.
